description: Add or remove licenses on NetApp ONTAP.

username.description: This can be a Cluster-scoped or SVM-scoped account, depending on whether a Cluster-level or SVM-level API is required. For more information, please read the documentation U(https://goo.gl/BRu78Z).

remove_unused.description: Remove licenses that have no controller affiliation in the cluster.

hostname.description: The hostname or IP address of the ONTAP instance.

remove_expired.description: Remove licenses that have expired in the cluster.

licenses.description: List of licenses to add or remove.

serial_number.description: Serial number of the node associated with the license.
